Gene.FullName: colony stimulating factor 2 receptor subunit alpha
SHOX downstream enhancer, distal recombination region
SHOX downstream enhancer, proximal recombination region
phosphatidylinositol specific phospholipase C X domain containing 1
protein kinase cAMP-dependent X-linked catalytic subunit

SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

SampleDescription.Description: Phenotype: small for gestational age 5 pounds 4 ounces at term, speech delay, problems with attention/focus, femoral anteversion

ClinicalAssertion.StudyDescription: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations, with clinical assertions as classified by the original submitter.
ClinicalAssertion.Comment: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations, with clinical assertions as classified by the original submitter.
